description: NASA’s Imaging X-ray Polarimetry Explorer (IXPE) has made surprising observations in a black hole binary system, detecting a high degree of X-ray polarisation that challenges current models of corona structure and accretion discs. In X-ray binaries, black holes pull matter from nearby stars, forming hot accretion discs and coronas.
title: NASA’s IXPE Challenges Theories on Black Hole Corona and Polarised X-Ray Emissions

description: United Launch Alliance launched its powerful Vulcan Centaur rocket carrying NTS-3, a cutting-edge GPS PNT satellite for the U.S. military. This mission marks the first military experimental navigation satellite launch in 48 years. With advanced anti-jamming technology and the ability to reprogram in orbit, NTS-3 sets a new benchmark for satellite security and flexibility.
title: ULA’s Vulcan Centaur Launches NTS-3, Advancing Military Satellite Navigation

description: Europe’s heavy-lift Ariane 6 rocket completed its third successful launch on Aug. 12, 2025, lifting off from Kourou, French Guiana at 8:37 p.m. EDT. The mission carried Metop-SGA1, an 8,900-pound next-generation polar-orbiting weather satellite operated by EUMETSAT. Placed into an 800 km polar orbit 64 minutes after liftoff, Metop-SGA1 will deliver high-resolution global observations of temperature, precipitation, clouds, winds, sea ice, aerosols, and pollution. Built by ArianeGroup for the European Space Agency, Ariane 6 is Europe’s successor to the Ariane 5. This launch follows its commercial debut in March 2025, marking another milestone in strengthening Europe’s independent access to space.
title: Ariane 6 Launches Metop-SGA1 Weather Satellite into Polar Orbit

description: The Infinix Hot 60i has been officially launched in India. The smartphone features a 6.75-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz screen refresh rate. The handset is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6400 processor and packs 4GB of RAM. It also comes with up to 128GB of eMMC 5.1 storage. The device features a 6,000mAh battery and offers 18W fast charging support. The device is available in Shadow Blue, Monsoon Green, Plum Red, and Sleek Black colour options.
title: Infinix Hot 60i 5G Launched in India with Dimensity 6400 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: From Mare of Easttown creator Brad Ingelsby, Task is a gripping seven-episode HBO series starring Mark Ruffalo as an FBI agent investigating violent home-invasion robberies in suburban Philadelphia. The show follows both law enforcement and the criminals, exploring loyalty, desperation, and moral boundaries. With its mix of thriller elements and human drama, Task promises an intense viewing experience.
title: Task OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch mark Ruffalo Starrer Series Online?

description: The Vivo G3 5G has been officially launched in China. The smartphone features a 6.74-inch HD display with a 90Hz screen refresh rate. The handset is powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor and packs up to 8GB of RAM. It also comes with up to 256GB of UFS 2.2 storage. The device features a 6,000mAh battery and offers 44W fast charging support. The device is available in a single Diamond Black colour option.
title: Vivo G3 5G Announced with Dimensity 6300 SoC, 6,000mAh Battery: Price, Specifications

description: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold key features and specifications have been leaked online, revealing some of its flagship features. The fold is reported to pack the Google Tensor G5 processor along with an additional Tensor M2 security chip. The device is reported to feature 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB of storage. The Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold is said to feature a 5,015mAh battery with 30W fast charging support.
title: Google Pixel 10 Pro Fold Full Specifications Leaked Ahead of August 20 Launch

description: Windows 11 has been criticised for poor battery life, despite various upgrades over Windows 11. While common fixes like lowering screen brightness and changing power plans exist, there’s a simpler way to improve your laptop's battery performance. Here's how you can adjust a few key Windows 11 settings to significantly extend your battery life on your laptop.
title: How to Improve Battery Life on Windows 11 by Disabling This Feature: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE is launching pretty soon. Multiple leaks and rumours are suggesting multiple of the device's key features. Interestingly, the handset's official renders have been leaked online, revealing its design aesthetics and colour options. The smartphone is reported to be available in at least three colour options. Here's what you need to know.
title: Samsung Galaxy S25 FE Renders Leaked Online Ahead of Official Launch

description: WhatsApp message summaries were recently introduced to help you quickly catch up on long conversations. The AI-powered feature generates a summary of messages you received since you last opened a chat, but it is only available in select regions and currently supports English. While messages are end-to-end encrypted, they are temporarily sent to secure servers for processing. Here's how to use WhatsApp message summaries on iOS and Android.
title: How to Use WhatsApp Message Summaries on iOS and Android: A Step-by-Step Guide
